quotes.message: One of the most important things you can do on this earth is to let people know they are not alone.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: One of our goals is to encourage people that there is hope, there is a future.
quotes.name: Garth Coonce

quotes.message: Mistakes are experiences. Without these experiences, there is no learning.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Every positive attempt was as a result of encouragement, every encouragement leads to success.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Each victory with God can bring a reassurance once more that the ones born of God are victorious
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: Support and encouragement are found in the most unlikely places.
quotes.name: Raquel Cepeda

quotes.message: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
quotes.name: Victor Kiam

quotes.message: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Use encouragement. Make the fault seem easy to correct.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: There are high spots in all of our lives and most of them have come about through encouragement from someone else.
quotes.name: George Madison Adams

quotes.message: The essential support and encouragement comes from within, arising out of the mad notion that your society needs to know what only you can tell it.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Reassurances could dull pain, nobody would ever go to the trouble of pressing grapes.
quotes.name: Scott Lynch

quotes.message: One has to remember that every failure can be a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.name: Colonel Sanders

quotes.message: To many people holidays are not voyages of discovery, but a ritual of reassurance.
quotes.name: Phillip Adams

quotes.message: If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long.
quotes.name: Hayley Williams

quotes.message: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, it's not the end.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: Always see your mistakes as a learning curve.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: A child needs encouragement like a plant needs water.
quotes.name: Rudolf Dreikurs

quotes.message: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
quotes.name: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.message: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Encouragement is like water to the soul, it makes everything grow.
quotes.name: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.message: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.name: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.message: Reassurance is such a sad, mad thing. Deep inside, everyone knows the truth.
quotes.name: Michel Faber

quotes.message: One of the most beautiful gifts in the world is the gift of encouragement.
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: Every second you dwell on the past you steal from your future. Every minute you spend focusing on your problems you take away from finding your solutions.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: One word of encouragement can be enough to spark someone's motivation to continue with a difficult challenge.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: A word of Encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell
